text: Hagi agrama keganti kegamama huno Babiloni ran kuma'ma negeno'a amanage huno hu'ne. Ama agima marerisa Babiloni kumara nagra hankavereti eri fore nehu'na, avasase'ane kumara kintoankino, kinima manisnua noni'amo'a ama ana kumapi megahie. E'ina hanigeno nagimo'a vuno eno hanige'za, maka vahe'mo'za antahi vagaregahaze.
